titles.title: A concurrent resolution commemorating the 50th anniversary of the Security Consultative Meeting between the Republic of Korea and the United States.
A concurrent resolution commemorating the 50th anniversary of the Security Consultative Meeting between the Republic of Korea and the United States.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: Commemorates the 50th anniversary of the South Korea-U.S. Security Consultative Meeting, and reaffirms the military alliance between the two countries. Supports the continued pursuit of a complete and verifiable end to North Korea's nuclear weapons and ballistic missile programs.
